resources.string: Quizz App
Why shouldn\'t you dive when having the flu?
The water pressure intensifies the symptoms
A pressure equalization is not possible and the eardrum may be damaged
Which gas do body cells need to work properly?
Oxygen
How can a panicking person be approached in the water?
Approach form front, talk the person down, hand something to keep distance
Approach from back, grab quickly
The person should never be approached
The person can be approach without special care
What is the average breathing frequency of an adult? (Breaths per minute)
When helping someone what should always be considered?
Don\'t think, just do!
Be braver and quicker than usual. Someone needs your help!
Keep calm and consider your own protection first
Submit answers
Reset all answers
Gas
answers right!
Are you joking? Get out of here!
Your life saving skills need a little improvement
You are nearly a professional but maybe you should refresh your knowledge?
Wow! You will know what to do in any situation!
